title: Anna “Delvey” Sorokin: From Scamming Friends, Banks & Hotels to Netflix?
description:
Anna Delvey aka Anna Sorokin grew up in a modest Russian household but always dreamt of living a grandiose and lavish lifestyle. Upon moving to NYC and holding herself out to be a wealthy German heiress, she conned whoever she could to keep up the facade. Her luck ran out when she was sentenced to prison for her crimes. Or did it? Netflix heard about her story and offered her $320k to make a series about her. But how? Tune in to hear all about Anna’s cons and how Netflix cash helped her get out of trouble.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/legallyjudgy
LinkTree: https://linktr.ee/legallyjudgy
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
